0 为 10
1 为 20
2 为 50

LOADI R1 0
LOADI R2 1
LOADI R3 2
ADD R1 R2 R1
BRANCH R0 R1 R3 1 255
STOREI R1 0
HALT

//JUMP 0 //01010100000011000000000000000000

00101100000100000000000000000001
00101100000110000000000000000010
00000100000010010000100000000000
01010000000000001001100111111111
00111000000010000000000000000000
01111100000000000000000000000000

00101100000100000000000000000001
00101100000110000000000000000010

00111000000010000000000000000000
01111100000000000000000000000000


ADDI R0 R0 100
ADDI R2 R2 100
ADDI R3 R3 100
ADDI R0 R0 100
ADDI R3 R3 100
ADDI R0 R0 100
ADDI R3 R3 100
ADDI R0 R0 100
ADDI R3 R3 100
ADDI R0 R0 100
ADDI R3 R3 100
ADDI R1 R1 1
STORE R1 R0
ADDI R0 R0 1
BRANCH R2 R1 R2 2 253 

LOAD R4 R3
BRANCH R5 R5 R6 4 
ADDI R7 R5 0
ADDI R5 R6 0
ADDI R6 R7 0
STORE R5 R4
ADDI R4 R4 1
BRANCH R4 R4 R0 ()
